title: Cult Leader
desc:
Post 1423
- At the start of your turn, you get a goal. A 25% chance that it's Murder, and a 75% chance that it's Save. You can only have one goal at a time, replacing the previous one.
- At any time, make a deal. If everyone agrees, the deal is passed.
- If the deal is passed, and your goal is Murder, you win and everyone loses.
- If the deal is passed, and your goal is Save, everyone wins.
